Recommendations: If it is believed that the Vision of the University has been attained. It is suggested that the Vision be restated into a more challenging and inspiring statements such as MMSU as center of development and/or excellence in their areas of strengths.

If it is suggested that Vision and Mission of the College should be the same as the University's vision and mission. Therefore, the goals should be the aims of the College and the objectives for the program itself.
The University Vision and Mission should be printed in their College Catalogues, programs/activities and other printed materials.
Increase the level of awareness and understanding of the external stakeholders through on the air(radio and TV) for wider dissemination of the VMGO.
